body.p: “Not only is this cone “,” resting upright on the ground “,” fully blossomed “,” a very beautiful object “,” but the winged seeds which half fill my hand “,” small triangular black seeds with thin and delicate flesh-colored wings “,” remind me of fishes “,” –alewives “,” perchance “,” –their tails more of less curved. I do not show the curve of the tail.”
PE 9, pg. 227 / 3 Sept 1854 – 12 May 1855 / NNPM MA 1302:24 / T vol. # XVIII / PDF # XIII
